path: PDF Library/30 Rock Studio Maintenance - Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/Touch/Touchscreen URLs.docx
text: Decision Desk: http://100.113.82.82/output/SygFEPoWL 1A:http://100.113.82.82/output/B1vIVDsWU 3A: http://100.113.82.82/output/BkUJBPi-L100 10W (Road Touchscreen): http:/100.113.82.82/output/ByGySwj-8 DC Studio A MTP: http://100.113.82.82/output/SkXtVwibI DC Studio 5: http://100.113.82.82/output/BJqO4vs-8 Miami Telemundo: http://100.113.82.82/output/SyUOEwobL 4E Production Center: http://100.113.82.82/output/B1y_EwiWL 4E Town Square: http://100.113.82.82/output/Hy7PNPibI If a new shortcut needs to be created, it should be: C:\Users\admin\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe ENTER STUDIO URL HERE --start-fullscreen --kiosk -incognito --disable-pinch --overscroll-history-navigation=0 --check-for-update-interval=604800
